languages.text: "Не жалеешь, что отверг шанс постичь ксенотехнологию своими плотью и кровью?"
"Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"
languages.original_text: "Не жалеешь, что отверг шанс постичь ксенотехнологию своими плотью и кровью?"

traits.locale_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"
"Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"
"Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"
"Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"
"Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

languages.text: “你本来有机会，可以通过你自己的血肉来理解异形科技。你有没有后悔拒绝了这样的机会？”
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: “你本来有机会，可以通过你自己的血肉来理解异形科技。你有没有后悔拒绝了这样的机会？”

languages.text: «¿Alguna vez ha lamentado rechazar la oportunidad de comprender la xenotecnología mediante su carne y hueso?».
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Alguna vez ha lamentado rechazar la oportunidad de comprender la xenotecnología mediante su carne y hueso?».

languages.text: 「お前の血肉によって、異星技術を理解する機会を拒んだことを後悔はしていないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の血肉によって、異星技術を理解する機会を拒んだことを後悔はしていないのか？」

languages.text: "Bereut Ihr es manchmal, die Chance ausgeschlagen zu haben, Xenotech durch Euer eigen Fleisch und Blut zu verstehen?"
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: "Bereut Ihr es manchmal, die Chance ausgeschlagen zu haben, Xenotech durch Euer eigen Fleisch und Blut zu verstehen?"

languages.text: « Vous arrive-t-il de regretter de ne pas avoir saisi l'occasion de comprendre la xénotechnologie par le biais de votre propre chair ? »
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous arrive-t-il de regretter de ne pas avoir saisi l'occasion de comprendre la xénotech par le biais de votre propre chair ? »

languages.text: "Zeno teknolojilerini kendi bedenin üzerinde idrak etme fırsatını geri çevirdiğin için pişman mısın?"
languages.original_text: "Do you ever regret turning down the opportunity to comprehend xenotech through your own flesh and blood?"

traits.locale_text: "Zeno teknolojileri kendi bedeninle ve kanınla idrak etme fırsatını geri çevirdiğin için pişman mısın?"
